page.title: 07GLADSTONE ROAD INFANT SCHOOL
page.content: CHILDREN ARE ADMITTED TO THE INFANT SCHOOL AT THE BEGINNING OF THE YEAR IN WHICH THEY BECOME FIVE.THERE IS NO PURPOSE BUILT NURSERY UNIT OR CLASS AT THIS SCHOOL. ALL THE CHILDREN DO A VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES PLANNED WITH THE CHILD IN MIND. THE SECOND AND THIRD YEARS DO SUCH THINGS AS READING, WRITING, CREATIVE WORK AND COMPREHENSION.EVERY MORNING EXCEPT MONDAY ALL THE CHILDREN ASSEMBLE IN THE MAIN HALL TO SING AND SHOW WORK TO THE OTHER PUPILS. AT THE AGE OF SEVEN PLUS THE CHILDREN TRANSFER TO THE JUNIOR SCHOOL WHICH IS SITUATED ON THE SAME SITE. BOTH SCHOOLS SHARE A PLAYGROUND.
